code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));setUser(storedUser);const handleStorageChange=()=>{const updatedUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));setUser(updatedUser);};window.addEventListener("storage",handleStorageChange);return()=>window.removeEventListener("storage",handleStorageChange);},[]);const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("user");setUser(null);navigate("/");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:"Atelier Noir"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Po\u010Detna"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/o_nama",children:"O nama"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/ponuda",children:"Ponuda"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/kontakt",children:"Kontakt"})}),user&&user.role==="admin"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",children:"Admin"})}),user&&user.role!=="admin"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/korpa",children:"Korpa"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-buttons",children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn primary",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Odjavi se"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/log-in",className:"btn",children:"Prijavi se"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/sign-up",className:"btn primary",children:"Registruj se"})]})})]});};export default Navbar;
